attributes.action: LIMIT CRUELTY, CREATE JOBS, END EXPENSE
attributes.additional_details: THE CRUEL ARCHAIC EXPORT OF LIVE FARM ANIMALS SHOULD END BECAUSE OF THE SUFFERING CAUSED BY EXTREMELY LONG JOURNEYS OFTEN WITHOUT THE MANDATORY BREAKS, FOOD AND WATER THEN SLAUGHTERED IN WHAT WOULD BE UNACCEPTABLE CONDITIONS IN THE UK.    IF THE ANIMALS WERE KILLED AS NEAR TO REARING AS POSSIBLE (WHICH WOULD CREATE JOBS IN THE UK) AND EXPORTED AS MEAT IT WOULD ALSO END THE TIME AND EXPENSE OF POLICING A TRADE THAT A GREAT NUMBER OF PEOPLE FIND OBJECTIONABLE
